Title: Open Hearts
Actors: Mads Mikkelsen, Sonja Richter, Nikolaj Lie Kaas, Paprika Steen
Plot: SPOILER: Cecilie is devastated when her fiancée Joachim is seriously injured in a car accident and is paralyzed from the neck down. Marie was the driver that caused the accident and she ask her husband Niels, a doctor at the hospital where Joachim is being treated, to help out Cecilie. However their relationship evolves in an affair which threatens Niels family.
